# Flex

## Properties

`type AlignContent = 'center' | 'flex-start' | 'flex-end' | 'space-between' | 'space-around' | 'space-evenly' | 'stretch'`  
`type AlignItems = 'center' | 'flex-start' | 'flex-end' | 'stretch' | 'baseline'`  
`type Direction = 'row' | 'row-reverse' | 'column' | 'column-reverse'`  
`type Inline = boolean`  
`type JustifyContent = 'center' | 'flex-start' | 'flex-end' | 'space-between' | 'space-around' | 'space-evenly'`  
`type Wrap = 'nowrap' | 'wrap' | 'wrap-reverse'`  
`type BreakpointCustomizable<T> = { base: T; xs?: T; s?: T; m?: T; l?: T; xl?: T; }`

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Default        |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `alignContent`   | `align-content`   | This aligns a flex container's individual lines when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how 'justifyContent' aligns individual items along the main axis. | `'center'` <br>\|` 'flex-start'` <br>\|` 'flex-end'` <br>\|` 'space-between'` <br>\|` 'space-around'` <br>\|` 'space-evenly'` <br>\|` 'stretch'` <br>\|` BreakpointCustomizable<AlignContent>` | `'stretch'`    |
| `alignItems`     | `align-items`     | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the cross axis.                                                                                                              | `'center'` <br>\|` 'flex-start'` <br>\|` 'flex-end'` <br>\|` 'stretch'` <br>\|` 'baseline'` <br>\|` BreakpointCustomizable<AlignItems>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `'stretch'`    |
| `direction`      | `direction`       | Defines the direction of the main and cross axis. The default 'row' defines the main axis as horizontal left to right.                                                    | `'row'` <br>\|` 'row-reverse'` <br>\|` 'column'` <br>\|` 'column-reverse'` <br>\|` BreakpointCustomizable<Direction>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `'row'`        |
| `inline`         | `inline`          | Defines the flex containers content flow if 2 or more containers are siblings of each other.                                                                              | `boolean` <br>\|` BreakpointCustomizable<Inline>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `false`        |
| `justifyContent` | `justify-content` | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the main axis.                                                                                                               | `'center'` <br>\|` 'flex-start'` <br>\|` 'flex-end'` <br>\|` 'space-between'` <br>\|` 'space-around'` <br>\|` 'space-evenly'` <br>\|` BreakpointCustomizable<JustifyContent>`                                                                                            | `'flex-start'` |
| `wrap`           | `wrap`            | If set, overflowing elements will wrap to a new line.                                                                                                                     | `'nowrap'` <br>\|` 'wrap'` <br>\|` 'wrap-reverse'` <br>\|` BreakpointCustomizable<Wrap>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `'nowrap'`     |
